query.q: M::`huaweicloud_AGT.ECS`:(AVG(`disk_inodesUsedPercent_average`) AS `磁盘 Inodes 使用率`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `instance_name` = '#{instance_name}' }
M::`huaweicloud_AGT.ECS`:(AVG(`disk_ioUtils_average`) AS `磁盘 IO 使用率`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `instance_name` = '#{instance_name}' }
